name: CyberHeist
description:
A cyberpunk action RPG created for Lartu's One Week Mini-RPG Jam.

Hired to steal some valuable corporate data, an unnamed female agent infiltrates a corporate building with the help of her trusty(?) hacker-handler. But nothing usually goes according to plan in this line of work...

Keyboard/Mouse:

Press "P" to pause the game for control instructions.

Press "Q" when game is paused to quit the game.

Controller:

Press the "Start/Menu" button to pause the game for control instructions

Press the "Select/Back" button when game is paused to quit.

Playing with game controller recommended 

Credits

Design, code, art, 3D models, animation by:

  • Siepiau

Music by:

  • "Mech Monsters Closing In" by Eric Matyas (www.soundimage.org)
  • "Jewel Thieves" by Eric Matyas (www.soundimage.org)
  • "Heist" by Avery Alexander (arcticstealth.bandcamp.com)
  • "Getaway" by Avery Alexander (arcticstealth.bandcamp.com)

Additional art:

  • Technological Circuit Background by Freepik (www.freepik.com)
